meta.job_title: Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team to ensure on-time renewals and compliance with company policies.
Provide support, training, and guidance to renewal quoting analysts, and evaluate improvement opportunities.
Establish and maintain relationships with team leads of adjacent functions to develop and streamline processes and drive process improvements.
Assist with special projects related to the renewal quoting process and function, and ensure achievement of key metrics.
Drive effectiveness and efficiency in renewal quote creation/revision and ensure compliance with pricing policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
